subject: feat(analysis): add Phase 5 graph analysis algorithms + visualization
body:
Implements six graph algorithms as pure functions on adjacency lists,
with a collapsible UI panel for running them and visual overlays on
the graph canvas for displaying results.

Algorithms implemented:
- Degree centrality: identifies hub nodes by connection count
- Betweenness centrality (Brandes): finds bridge nodes between clusters
- PageRank (power iteration): ranks nodes by network influence
- Connected components (BFS): partitions graph into disconnected groups
- Shortest path (BFS): finds shortest route between two selected nodes
- Clustering coefficient: measures local triangle density

Visualization:
- Score-based node sizing (30-70px scaled by normalized score)
- Path highlighting with accent color on nodes and arcs
- Component coloring with 10-color palette
- Non-highlighted elements dimmed to 20% opacity
- Cytoscape class-based styling (analysis-dimmed, analysis-highlighted)

UI:
- AnalysisPanel with algorithm dropdown, description, source/target pickers
- Top-20 results table sorted by score
- Path display with arrow notation
- Component count summary
- Collapsible panel (visible only in graph view)

Also removes stale reference to nonexistent docs/EXTRACTION_PLAYBOOK.md.

Test coverage: 103 total (29 new analysis tests covering all algorithms
with star/chain/triangle/disconnected graph fixtures).
